entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add Queue<T>.CopyTo(Span<T> destination) #69954
  • Tar tests that interact with file assets do not work on Browser #69953
    7.0.0
  • Reading and Installing specific dotnet workload versions? #69951
  • [NativeAOT] Investigate esoteric failures in System.Linq.Expression.Tests #69944
  • [NativeAOT] System.Linq.Expression.Tests - add NumericOperators to rd.xml #69943
  • [libraries-pgo] Assertion failed 'asgNode->OperIs(GT_ASG)' in during 'Morph - Global' #69939
  • [libraries-pgo] Assertion failed '(m_block->bbNext == nullptr) || (m_block->bbNext->bbPrev == m_block)' during 'Update flow graph opt pass' #69938
  • System.Text.Json cannot bind to fields #69936
  • [API Proposal]: Allow multiple Global Extended Attributes entries in Tar archives with PAX format #69935
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] random `memory access out of bounds` in `System.Xml.XmlSchemaSet.Tests` on linux #69934
    7.0.0

Closed

  • ildasm and ilasm round trip can fail with function pointers on macOS #69952
  • Regex.Match(string input, int startat) fails with ^ prefix. #69949
  • JIT assert on arm32 when running DllImportGenerator unit tests: remainingSize == 4 #60705
    7.0.0
  • Unexpected JIT helper in TreatAsHasRetBufArg #69612
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] perf pipeline builds failing to build the wasm app #69861
    7.0.0
  • Implement Write(T) Overloads in FastSerializer #8084
    Future
  • Move the MetadataLabel Interner into FastSerialization #8087
    Future
  • Support Specifying Session on WriteEvent #8089
    Future
  • [wasm][aot] Assertion failure - `unexpected GC filler class` in `Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core.Tests` #63749
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: PemEncoding.WriteString #65144
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers #69730
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Wasm AOT micro optimizations #69955
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [Draft] Move Format property from TarReader to TarEntry #69950
    area-System.IO, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Rename NativeMemory.ZeroMemory #69948
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable folding of struct indirs used by returns in local morph #69947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix jit stress now that W^X is enabled #69946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Expression tests for NativeAOT #69945
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • handle SECURITY_STATUS 0x80090016 #69942
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Split out and generalize tailcall IR validation/tailcall profile adjustments #69941
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Array.GetFlattenedIndex (all runtimes) and InternalGetValue (CoreCLR) #69940
    community-contribution
  • Change dispenser policy for RuntimeAssembly to ReuseAlways #69937
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Draft] Allow multiple Global Extended Attributes entries in Tar archives with PAX format #69933
    area-System.IO, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1794944 #69932
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [IGNORE] `perf-wasm` pipeline #69931
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm

Merged

  • Remove unused MissingMemberException.FormatSignature #69890
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Optimize better with maximum array length #69735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Relax the address exposure condition in forward substitution #69818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle mis-sized structs in ARM/64 `PUTARG_STK` codegen #69905
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: allow pinvoke calli helper in TreatAsShouldHaveRetBufArg #69927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactoring the generic-math CreateChecked/Saturating/Truncating APIs to match API review #69756
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Pin char when UTF-16 marshalling is specified and runtime marshalling is disabled #69837
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Explicitly include mscorlib.dll, to support scanning assemblies #69886
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement LoadLibraryErrorTracker #69842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Pin thrown exceptions during EH. #69916
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement PemEncoding.WriteString #69877
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove Or, And, Not + related fixes #69839
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [MONO] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix Stream.ReadAtLeast perf regression in DataContractSerializer #69879
    area-Serialization

Updated

  • Consolidate morphing of local nodes #69819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Aggressive GC #69695
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Delete `GT_INDEX` #69917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Convert Valuetype.FastEqualsCheck and GetHashCodeOfPtr to managed #69723
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: defer some flow graph reordering until after loop recognition #69878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Release/6.0] JIT: fix interaction of GDV and boxing (#60355) #69630
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle "mis-sized" structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Utilize VN-based non-null knowledge better #69808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete an old quirk from `gtSetEvalOrder` #69894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Rev .NET 5 to net6.0 or $(NetCoreAppCurrent) #69911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Fix hard link creation in tar tests in Android, iOS, tvOS #69416
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Do not add x86 host to PATH on 64-bit machines #69902
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Improve Encoding.UTF8.GetMaxByte/CharCount perf #69910
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 7.0.0
  • Some cleanups in Native AOT suspension area #69885
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [Release/6.0] Fix singlefile bundle alignment on OSX ARM64 #69930
    area-Single-File
  • Remove more wprintf usages #69912
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Possible build time regression on empty macOS (Arm64) projects #25037
    Discussion

Updated

  • Make ImplicitUsings does not work out of the box with .NET Framework project #24909
    6.0.4xx
  • NETSDK1152 Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web Library with package.lock.json during publishing #25294
  • Project-level default for await configuration #25685
  • NU1507 build failure when updating to 6.0.300 from 6.0.202 #25379
  • Add fallback root certificate bundle #25686

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Prevent inline hints from being toggled after holding CTRL #61574

Updated

  • Position of new class method which is created outside of the class via VS-proposals seems to be arbitrary #61542
  • Make `NormalizeWhitespace` cancellable #61561

PullRequests

Created

  • Record added node output states as new #61575
    Area-Compilers, Community

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61577
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use VS2022 for PR Validation builds #61576
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Bind native integers in cref #61431
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61572
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge Required Members to main #61571
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61579
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Find implementation assemblies for reference assemblies in the .NET SDK #61526
    Area-IDE
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Add tool window #61499
    Area-Compilers
  • Include local-functions in the go-to index. #61568
    Area-IDE
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets - Remove reflection and call the LanguageServerSnippetExpander directly #61491
    Area-IDE
  • Add Move Static Member To Existing Type #61519
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: mapaction, mvc, plaintext_netty #41906
  • Perf improvement: https #41905
  • Perf regression: json_netty, json_nodejs, mapaction, plaintext_nodejs #41903
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix, fortunes_ef, mvc #41902

Closed

  • If-None-Match and If-Modified-Since headers not being process by .NET 6 on VS 2022 #36291
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Updated

  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • Adding WebTransport Handshake to Kestrel #41877
    area-runtime
  • Convert all possible `DllImport`s to `LibraryImport` for .NET 7+ #41573
    area-runtime
  • Implement Http/2 WebSockets #41558
    area-runtime
  • Add a new route to sample app that display OS and .NET versions #41901
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Create selection not present, but also apparently unnecessary #7579
  • Error: System Image folder in config.ini doesn't exist #7578
  • FlyoutIcon does not work on Windows, although it works on Android #7577
  • error NU1101: Unable to find package #7576
  • CarouselView doesn't scroll to the CurrentItem when set #7575
  • [iOS]The "FontAttributes" property of label is not rendered on ios and maccatalyst. #7574
  • VerticalOptions cannot be set on a Rectangle in Windows #7573
  • MAUI on Big Sur with Xcode 12 #7572
  • "Pressed" Visual State not changing back to "Normal" until you click away on Windows #7570
  • Unable to disable zooming in MAUI Blazor App for Windows #7569
  • When renaming a newly added XAML page in Visual Studio 2022 only the filename gets changed #7568
  • Maui Android OnBackPressed has wrong return type #7567
  • System.MissingMethodException: No parameterless constructor defined for type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Handlers.Compatibility.FrameRenderer' #7566
  • .NET Multi-platform App UI development #7565
  • Two groups of radio buttons acts like one group in Windows #7564
  • DisableAsync Permission for Essentials #7563
  • MeasureFirstItem makes items disappear on Android #7562
  • Frame style in App class ignored #7560
  • Support the Mac Idiom for Mac Catalyst apps #7559
  • Setting SetIsSmoothScrollEnabled to false on a TabbedPage causes blank pages after navigating. #7558
  • Re-Enable browser developer tools for debugging webview in maui #7557

PullRequests

Updated

  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.12.0.8 to 4.13.2 #7532
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SetBeforeSaveBehavior(PropertySaveBehavior.Ignore) not working when inserting parent with child entity with automatic linking #28122

PullRequests

Created

  • Cosmos: Add translator for Regex.IsMatch method #28121

Updated

  • Translate spatial aggregates #28115
  • Fix parameter type mapping for Sqlite #27291
